Title: Relates to requiring manufacturers to use a coding system on all handgun and assault weapon ammunition
Summary: Establishes a statewide database to maintain and track coded ammunition; establishes penalties for individuals who violate such provisions; also establishes the ammunition coding system database fund.
LawCode: Add ยง396-gg, Gen Bus L; add ยง265.50, Pen L; add ยง91-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the penal law, in relation to establishing a statewide database to maintain and track coded ammunition and establishing penalties for individuals who violate such provisions; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the ammunition coding system database fund
